pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===============type_extensions===============Importable mixin methods for Python.Description===========The ``type_extensions`` package defines decorators that make it possible to define typedextension methods outside the original class definition in a separate module. Themethods defined by a ``type_extension`` module may be imported and used in other moduleswithout polluting the the original class definition for other modules.Note====This project has been set up using PyScaffold 3.2. For details and usageinformation on PyScaffold see https://pyscaffold.org/.
